document_data.name: Mount Ghaethluntar
document_data.mainbody: '''Mount Ghaethluntar''', also known as the '''Great Mount of Ghaethluntar''', was a huge mountain located in the [[North Faerûn|extreme north]] of [[Faerûn]].{{Cite dungeon/170/Monument of the Ancients|63}}
document_data.Description: This lone mountain stood nearly {{SI|100|miles|long=yes}} in length.{{Cite polyhedron/81/The Everwinking Eye: As Cold As Bare Fingers|8}} The base of the mountain was home to roaming herds of [[surface rothé]],{{Cite polyhedron/75/The Everwinking Eye: Sagely Secrets Made Known|11}} while it was said that the mountain itself was honeycombed with caverns linked by natural and carved-out tunnels, inhabited by thousands of [[flind]]s and [[gnoll]]s.{{Cite dungeon/170/Monument of the Ancients|63}}
document_data.Trade: The gnolls sent caravans down the [[Remorhaz Ride]] through the icy tundra, hauling 40 to 60 ore-laden sledges at a time from Mount Ghaethluntar to [[Frozen Flindyke]].
